data.prayer: Jesus, for those distressed and afraid in Chuzhou, Anhui, China, show them today that you give peace at all times and in every situation.
data.verse: Now may the Lord of peace himself give you peace at all times in all ways. The Lord be with you all.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Chuzhou, Anhui, China

data.prayer: Lord we pray you unite the 298,733 believers to pray at all times in the Spirit, with all prayer and supplication, for spiritual breakthrough in Chuzhou.
data.verse: in every situation, by prayer and petition, with thanksgiving, present your requests to God.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 13 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Spirit, how will they hear without a preacher? How will they preach unless they have a Bible? Please give the people in the county of Chuzhou access to a Bible in their own language.
data.verse: How, then, can they call on the one they have not believed in? And how can they believe in the one of whom they have not heard? And how can they hear without someone preaching to them? And how can anyone preach unless they are sent? As it is written: “How beautiful are the feet of those who bring good news!”

data.prayer: Father, help the 298,733 believers in Chuzhou to know that you can make a big impact through their simple obedience today.
data.verse: you will be for me a kingdom of priests

data.prayer: Spirit, help the church in the county of Chuzhou do things that will multiply their numbers, not just add to them.
data.verse: But thanks be to God, who always leads us triumphantly as captives in Christ and through us spreads everywhere the fragrance of the knowledge of Him.

data.prayer: Father, guide the church in Chuzhou, Anhui, China to see their community as a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God.
data.verse: you also, like living stones, are being built into a spiritual house to be a holy priesthood, offering spiritual sacrifices acceptable to God through Jesus Christ.

data.prayer: Oh Lord, show the fatherless in the county of Chuzhou that you can be their real Father.
data.verse: I will be to you a Father. you will be to me sons and daughters,’ says the Lord Almighty.

location.name: Chuzhou
location.cities_list: Chuzhou, Mingguang, Fengyang Fuchengzhen, Zhengji, Renheji
location.cities_list_w_pop: Chuzhou (782,671), Mingguang (68,351), Fengyang Fuchengzhen, Zhengji, Renheji
